item.title: About this blog
item.author: mtganalyze@gmail.com (Felix Weidemann)
item.description: Magic: the Gathering is a game bigger than its box. With over 10,000 individual cards Magic offers endless possibilities to play. Using mathematical and statistical tools I try to find analytical solutions for imho interesting quantitative problems in and around the game. This blog won’t make you a better player but it will show you underappreciated puzzles within the world of Magic. This blog was created using the R package blogdown package.
